textarea:
{{Navbox | name = Ocean | title = [[Ocean current]]s and [[Ocean gyre|gyres]] | state = {{{state|autocollapse}}} | image = <!-- Avoid adding image, as it will cramp-up the text. Thanks --> | listclass = hlist
| group1 = [[Ocean current|Currents]] | list1 = {{Navbox|subgroup | group1 = Arctic Ocean | list1 = * [[East Greenland Current|East Greenland]] * [[North Icelandic Jet|North Icelandic]] * [[Norwegian Current|Norwegian]] * [[Transpolar Drift Stream]]
| group2 = Atlantic Ocean | list2 = * [[Angola Current|Angola]] * [[Antilles Current|Antilles]] * [[Azores Current|Azores]] * [[Baffin Island Current|Baffin Island]] * [[Benguela Current|Benguela]] * [[Brazil Current|Brazil]] * [[Canary Current|Canary]] * [[Cape Horn Current|Cape Horn]] * [[Caribbean Current|Caribbean]] * [[East Greenland Current|East Greenland]] * [[East Iceland Current|East Iceland]] * [[Falkland Current|Falkland]] * [[Florida Current|Florida]] * [[Guinea Current|Guinea]] * [[Gulf Stream]] * [[Irminger Current|Irminger]] * [[Labrador Current|Labrador]] * [[Lomonosov Current|Lomonosov]] * [[Loop Current|Loop]] * [[North Atlantic Current|North Atlantic]] * [[North Brazil Current|North Brazil]] * [[North Equatorial Current|North Equatorial]] * [[Norwegian Current|Norwegian]] * [[Portugal Current|Portugal]] * [[Slope Jet Current|Slope Jet]] * [[South Atlantic Current|South Atlantic]] * [[South Equatorial Current|South Equatorial]] * [[West Greenland Current|West Greenland]] * [[West Spitsbergen Current|West Spitsbergen]]
| group3 = Indian Ocean | list3 = * [[Agulhas Current|Agulhas]] * [[Agulhas Return Current|Agulhas Return]] * [[East Madagascar Current|East Madagascar]] * [[Equatorial Counter Current|Equatorial Counter]] * [[Indian Monsoon Current|Indian Monsoon]] * [[Indonesian Throughflow]] * [[Leeuwin Current|Leeuwin]] * [[Madagascar Current|Madagascar]] * [[Mozambique Current|Mozambique]] * [[North Madagascar Current|North Madagascar]] * [[Somali Current|Somali]] * [[South Australian Counter Current|South Australian]]<!-- unsure this current exists or perhaps is not notable --> * [[South Equatorial Current|South Equatorial]] * [[West Australian Current|West Australian]]
| group4 = Pacific Ocean | list4 = * [[Alaska Current|Alaska]] * [[Aleutian Current|Aleutian]] * [[California Current|California]] * [[Cromwell Current|Cromwell]] * [[Davidson Current|Davidson]] * [[East Australian Current|East Australian]] * [[East Korea Warm Current|East Korea Warm]] * [[Equatorial Counter Current|Equatorial Counter]] * [[Humboldt Current|Humboldt]] * [[Indonesian Throughflow]] * [[Kamchatka Current|Kamchatka]] * [[Kuroshio Current|Kuroshio]] * [[Mindanao Current|Mindanao]] * [[North Equatorial Current|North Equatorial]] * [[North Korea Cold Current|North Korea Cold]] * [[North Pacific Current|North Pacific]] * [[Oyashio Current|Oyashio]] * [[South Equatorial Current|South Equatorial]] * [[Tasman Front]]
| group5 = Southern Ocean | list5 = * [[Antarctic Circumpolar Current|Antarctic Circumpolar]] * [[Tasman Outflow]] }}
| group2 = [[Ocean gyre|Gyres]] | list2 = {{Navbox|subgroup | group1 = Major gyres | list1 = * [[Indian Ocean Gyre]] * [[North Atlantic Gyre]] * [[South Atlantic Gyre]] * [[North Pacific Gyre]] * [[South Pacific Gyre]]
| group2 = Other gyres | list2 = * [[Beaufort Gyre]] * [[Ross Gyre]] * [[Weddell Gyre]] }}
| group3 = Related | list3 = * [[Atmospheric circulation]] * [[Boundary current]] * [[Coriolis force]] * [[Ekman transport]] * [[Marine debris]] * [[Garbage patch|Marine garbage patches]] ** [[Great Pacific garbage patch|Great Pacific]] ** [[Indian Ocean garbage patch|Indian Ocean]] ** [[North Atlantic garbage patch|North Atlantic]] ** [[South Pacific garbage patch|South Pacific]] * [[Thermohaline circulation]]
| below= '''{{portal-inline|size=small|Oceans}}''' }}<noinclude> [[Category:Ocean and sea templates| ]] [[Category:Science and nature templates]] </noinclude>
